title: Follow Kar Lo Yaar
overview: Uorfi Javed is India's biggest viral sensation - where she goes, drama follows. Her infamy and her clothes are self made! But now with the help of her new talent agency, Uorfi wants to go beyond and tweak her professional perception. At the same time, she also has to keep her loving but fully dysfunctional family together.Â Will this eternal hustler fight her way through?
